name: Super Ninja Game (Zuper Hugo Time)
description:
SUPER NINJA GAME

The blue empire has stolen your ancient dragon amulet. It is your mission take back, but this will be not easy because all the ninja from blue empire await for your arrival.

HOW TO PLAY

You need to get to the chest that is in the enemy empire, take back the ancient dragon amulet and return to the initial chest, before the times over. If you take too long time, the screen will turn black and makes impossible to pass the level, then the game over. You can use the bamboo to hide of the other ninjas.

CONTROLS 

- Use the arrows to move

- Use the space to interact with the chests

- Use the mouse (or touch if you are in mobile) to press the buttons [Actually I'm not sure how to control the buttons with only the arrows :( ]
